subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: A 25-year-old Red Star Belgrade fan was stabbed to death in fan violence before the team’s Euroleague basketball match at Galatasaray in Istanbul, the Serbian consul in the Turkish capital told Serbia’s state television, RTS.
snippet: A 25-year-old Red Star Belgrade fan was stabbed to death in fan violence before the team’s Euroleague basketball match at Galatasaray in Istanbul, the Serbian consul in the Turkish capital told Serbia’s state television, RTS.
